duties_responsibilities.duty: Integrate into the brand with the intent of supporting a flagship store manager in leading all activities necessary to the efficient operation of the store and provide prompt and courteous service to customers.
Prepare and oversee a flagship store in the store manager’s absence as well as take over the next open store in a designated market.
Supervise all team members essential to the efficient operation of the store.
Maximize store sales by providing the highest level of customer satisfaction.
Ensure that all employees comply with company policies, practices, and procedures.
Ensure that the store operates within its predetermined budget.
Adhere to and enforce loss prevention and security policies, credit policies and procedures.
Ensure that all merchandise is properly ticketed, attractively displayed, and communicate stock replenishment needs to Store Manager.
Assist in training team members in product knowledge, visual presentation, sales techniques, and administration.
Enforce and comply with all store/company policy and procedures.
